name: UpdateServiceEndpoints
description: Update service endpoints in the Power Platform / Dataverse environment.
helpMarkDown: Reads a json array of serviceendpointid and configValue, and update the service endpoints details
author: Satya Kar

inputs.name: url
inputs.label: Dataverse URL
inputs.helpMarkDown: The URL for the target Dataverse environment

inputs.name: clientId
inputs.label: Client Id
inputs.helpMarkDown: The registered clientId for User from Azure AD

inputs.name: clientSecret
inputs.label: Client Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: The generated secret for the clientId

inputs.name: useAzureKeyVaultSecret
inputs.label: Use of Azure KeyVault Secret
inputs.helpMarkDown: If true, the task will get the service endpoint connection string from the Azure KeyVault Secret.

inputs.name: serviceEndpointConfig
inputs.label: Config (A json array of serviceendpointid & environment variable name)

inputs.name: serviceEndpointConfig1
inputs.label: Config (A json array of serviceendpointid & service endpoint connectionstring(sb://))
